courses.title: Beginner Guitar Course
courses.description: Learn acoustic and electric guitar from scratch with proper techniques and practice routines.

courses.title: Professional Piano Training
courses.description: Master piano skills including classical pieces, chords, and music theory.

courses.title: Vocal Music Fundamentals
courses.description: Improve your vocal range, breathing techniques, and pitch control.

courses.title: Advanced Drum Techniques
courses.description: Learn advanced drumming patterns, rhythm control, and live performance skills.

courses.title: Music Production with DAWs
courses.description: Create professional music using DAWs like FL Studio, Ableton, and Logic Pro.

courses.title: Violin for Beginners
courses.description: Learn violin basics, posture, bowing techniques, and simple melodies.

courses.title: Music Theory Complete Course
courses.description: Understand scales, chords, harmony, rhythm, and composition techniques.
